author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan and gently fry the onion until soft but not coloured. Add the aubergine, chilli flakes and tomato purée and fry for 4-5 minutes, until the aubergine is soft. Add the prawns and cook for a further 2-3 minutes, until completely cooked through. To serve, sprinkle over the chopped parsley.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, finely sliced,  2 baby aubergines, chopped,  1 tsp chilli flakes,  1 tbsp tomato purée,  2 king prawns, peeled, deveined and chopped,  1 tsp chopped flatleaf parsley, to serve
